languages.text: "Генетическая мерзость запятнала собой своды храма памяти. Я возглавлю священное бдение в усыпальнице, дабы скверна была избыта и свет Императора вновь воссиял в Его чертогах".

traits.locale_text: "Генетическая анафема запятнала собой своды храма памяти. Я возглавлю священное бдение в усыпальнице, дабы скверна была избыта и свет Императора вновь воссиял в Его чертогах".

languages.text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."
languages.original_text: "Генетическая мерзость запятнала собой своды храма памяти. Я возглавлю священное бдение в усыпальнице, дабы скверна была избыта и свет Императора вновь воссиял в Его чертогах".

traits.locale_text: "Genetic anathema has sullied the halls of this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

"Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

languages.text: «Una aberración genética ha mancillado este templo del recuerdo. Celebraré una vigilia en la cripta para asegurarme de que toda la corrupción sea purgada y la luz del Emperador vuelva a brillar en Sus estancias».
languages.original_text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

traits.locale_text: «Una aberración genética ha mancillado este templo del recuerdo. Celebraré una vigilia en la cripta para asegurarme de que toda la corrupción sea purgada y la luz del Emperador vuelva a brillar en Sus estancias».

languages.text: 「遺伝的忌まわしきものがこの記憶の神殿を汚している。私は地下聖堂で警戒を行い、すべての腐敗が追放され、皇帝陛下の御光が再び皇帝の広間で輝くことを見届ける」
languages.original_text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

traits.locale_text: 「遺伝的忌まわしきものがこの記憶の神殿を汚している。私は地下聖堂で警戒を行い、すべての腐敗が追放され、皇帝陛下の御光が再び皇帝の広間で輝くことを見届ける」

languages.text: “那些基因怪物玷污了这座记忆的殿堂。我准备在地下墓穴进行守夜，确保所有腐化之物都被驱逐一空，确保帝皇的明光再次充满祂的殿堂。”
languages.original_text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

traits.locale_text: “那些基因怪物玷污了这座记忆的殿堂。我准备在地下墓穴进行守夜，确保所有腐化之物都被驱逐一空，确保帝皇的明光再次充满祂的殿堂。”

languages.text: "Genetische Abscheulichkeit hat diesen Tempel der Erinnerung besudelt. Ich werde in der Krypta wachen, um sicherzustellen, dass die Verderbnis ausgemerzt wird und das Licht des Imperators aufs Neue in Seinen Hallen erstrahlt."
languages.original_text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

traits.locale_text: "Genetische Abscheulichkeit hat diesen Tempel der Erinnerung besudelt. Ich werde in der Krypta wachen, um sicherzustellen, dass die Verderbnis ausgemerzt wird und das Licht des Imperators aufs Neue in Seinen Hallen erstrahlt."

languages.text: « Ce temple de la mémoire porte la souillure de l'aberration génétique. Je vais organiser une veillée dans la crypte pour en expurger toute trace de corruption et restaurer la lumière de l'Empereur dans Ses salles sacrées. »
languages.original_text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."

traits.locale_text: « Ce temple de la mémoire porte la souillure de l'aberration génétique. Je vais organiser une veillée dans la crypte pour en expurger toute trace de corruption et restaurer la lumière de l'Empereur dans Ses salles sacrées. »

languages.text: "Genetik sapkı, tarihle dolu bu tapınağı kirletmiş. Mahzende dua edeceğim. Tüm yozlaşmanın defedilip İmparator'un ışığının, bu koridorlardan bir kez daha parlamasını sağlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Genetic aberration has sullied this temple of memory. I will conduct a vigil in the crypt to ensure that all corruption is expelled and the Emperor's light shines in His halls once more."
